intent_atoms.description: Implement a Combine-backed bridge that fan‑outs ParseEvent streams to multiple subscribers and provide a @MainActor parse tree store aggregating validation issues for SwiftUI consumers.
The ParsePipelineEventBridge must convert AsyncThrowingStream pipelines into shareable Combine publishers with deterministic cancellation semantics.
ParseTreeStore must maintain hierarchical box trees and accumulated validation issues while staying main‑actor isolated for SwiftUI updates.
Tests in ParseTreeStoreTests must cover bridge fan‑out, tree aggregation, and failure propagation.
The Combine-backed bridge must always provide deterministic cancellation semantics for subscribers.
Use a Combine-backed bridge (ParsePipelineEventBridge) to convert AsyncThrowingStream pipelines into shareable publishers.
Store parse tree and validation issues in a @MainActor isolated ParseTreeStore for SwiftUI updates.

functional_units.name: ParsePipelineEventBridge
functional_units.description: Converts AsyncThrowingStream pipelines into shareable Combine publishers with deterministic cancellation semantics and fan‑outs ParseEvent streams to multiple subscribers.

functional_units.name: ParseTreeStore
functional_units.description: MainActor isolated store that aggregates hierarchical parse tree snapshots and accumulated validation issues for SwiftUI consumers.

functional_units.name: Snapshot Models for ParseTreeStore
functional_units.description: Data structures representing hierarchical box trees and validation issue collections used by ParseTreeStore.

functional_units.name: SwiftUI Bridge Integration
functional_units.description: Exposes the Combine-backed bridge to SwiftUI components, enabling real‑time updates of parse tree data and validation issues.
